entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 p.m. PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burns Lake Airport 10:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain mixed with wet snow beginning late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 9:04 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with wet snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:04 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 9:04 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
